vote.title: Authorize a two-year Joint Funding Agreement with the United States Geological Survey to continue the operation of stream flow and water quality gauging stations in the Trinity River Basin for water supply, watershed protection, and special studies that include the Zebra Mussel Monitoring Program; Upper Trinity River Gain/Loss Study; Reservoir Water Quality Study and Harmful Algal Bloom Study for the period November 1, 2022 through September 2024 - Not to exceed $1,911,605.00 - Financing: Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($1,887,755.00) and Stormwater Drainage Management Fund ($23,850.00) (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize a two-year Joint Funding Agreement with the United States Geological Survey to continue the operation of stream flow and water quality gauging stations in the Trinity River Basin for water supply, watershed protection, and special studies that include the Zebra Mussel Monitoring Program; Upper Trinity River Gain/Loss Study; Reservoir Water Quality Study and Harmful Algal Bloom Study for the period November 1, 2022 through September 2024 - Not to exceed $1,911,605.00 - Financing: Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($1,887,755.00) and Stormwater Drainage Management Fund ($23,850.00) (subject to annual appropriations)
